name: unfilterjs
description: A Javascript library that allows you to unfilter your filtered stuff

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && exit 1 && mocha $npm_package_options_mocha
scripts.build: babel src --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir dist && cd dist/ && uglifyjs unfilter.js -o unfilter.min.js
